docs.snippet: A impoverished country with a wealth of spirit, culture and history finds itself in the cross currents of problems both local and global. Too much is at stake to let our usual ignorance of Africa thwart an intelligent response to the twin crises o...
docs.abstract: A impoverished country with a wealth of spirit, culture and history finds itself in the cross currents of problems both local and global. Too much is at stake to let our usual ignorance of Africa thwart an intelligent response to the twin crises of a coup and a rebellion.

headline.main: Want to Place Bets on Facebook's Next Acquisition?

docs.snippet: As you may have heard, Facebook scooped up the profitless photo-sharing app, Instagram, for a cool $1 billion on Monday. Now some have started placing bets on which start-ups the social network will acquire next....

headline.main: Yahoo C.E.O. Hints at a Strategy

headline.main: A Roadblock to Recovering Money for Madoff's Victims

docs.snippet: The trustee appointed on behalf of investors steps into the shoes of the perpetrator of the fraud, and any knowledge of wrongdoing is attributed to the trustee, so that a claim against another participant in the scheme runs into the "in pari delic...
docs.abstract: The trustee appointed on behalf of investors steps into the shoes of the perpetrator of the fraud, and any knowledge of wrongdoing is attributed to the trustee, so that a claim against another participant in the scheme runs into the "in pari delicto" doctrine.

headline.main: More Words We Love Too Much

docs.snippet: After Deadline's relentless cliché watch continues, thanks to Patrick LaForge and some other sharp-eyed colleagues. In deadline haste, sometimes it's hard to avoid falling back on a familiar stockpile of words and phrases. But let's stay alert an...
docs.abstract: After Deadline's relentless cliché watch continues, thanks to Patrick LaForge and some other sharp-eyed colleagues. In deadline haste, sometimes it's hard to avoid falling back on a familiar stockpile of words and phrases. But let's stay alert and not write on autopilot. And copy editors - help those harried writers out.
